settings.name: Konduru Akhil
settings.title: Software Engineer Intern
settings.summary: Software Engineer Intern with experience in web application development and problem-solving using various technologies and frameworks.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Software Engineer Intern with a passion for developing user-friendly web applications. I have experience in translating client requirements into functional UI/UX components and applying strong problem-solving skills to ensure optimal performance across browsers and devices. I am proficient in maintaining clean, scalable code and following best practices for front-end architecture. I am eager to contribute my skills and learn from experienced professionals.

items.description: Developed responsive, user-friendly web applications, tailored to client needs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Java. Collaborated with clients to gather requirements translated them into functional UI/UX components. Applied strong problem-solving skills to develop, test, and debug features, ensuring optimal performance across browsers and devices. Maintained clean, saleable code and followed best practices for front-end architecture.

items.title: Real State Application
items.description: Developed a basic real estate management console application using Java to simulate flat property details and price calculation. Implemented object-oriented principles by creating a Flat class with encapsulated fields and relevant constructors and methods. Designed and implemented a method to dynamically calculate the price of a flat based on square foot and price per square foot.

items.title: E-commerce website
items.description: Developed responsive, user-friendly web pages according to client needs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Applied strong problem-solving skills to develop, test, and debug features, ensuring optimal performance across browsers and devices. Maintained clean, scalable code and followed best practices for front-end architecture

items.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering
